wiki: the .net framework is a software framework designed mainly for the microsoft windows operating system.
asp.net is a microsoft web application development framework that allows programmers to build dynamic web sites web applications and web services.
visual basic.net (vb.net) is a multi-paradigm managed type-safe object-oriented computer programming language.
windows presentation foundation or wpf is a subsystem for rendering user interfaces in windows-based applications.
visual studio 2010 is an integrated development environment (ide) from microsoft.

the asp.net mvc framework is an open source web application framework and tooling that implements a version of the model-view-controller (mvc) pattern tailored towards web applications and built upon an asp.
a "web service" is a software system designed to support interoperable machine-to-machine interaction over the world wide web.
language integrated query (linq) is a microsoft .net framework component that adds native data querying capabilities to .net languages.
microsoft sharepoint is a platform and a family of software products developed by microsoft for collaboration and web publishing.
linq to sql is a component of .net framework version 3.5 that provides a run-time infrastructure for managing relational data as objects stored in microsoft sql server.
extensible application markup language (xaml) is a declarative xml-based language used for  initializing structured values and objects in various frameworks.
windows phone is microsoft's now deprecated mobile operating system and software development platform.
microsoft azure is a platform as a service and infrastructure as a service cloud computing platform.
f# is a succinct expressive and efficient functional and object-oriented language for .net which helps you write simple code to solve complex problems.
razor is a template language used by asp.
